a22.l: select name from coretstructhdr where coretstructhdrid =:oldrecid
select caption from coretstructhdr where coretstructhdrid =:oldrecid
select dcselect from coretstructhdr where coretstructhdrid =:oldrecidcal
select sorderno from coretstructhdr where coretstructhdrid =:oldrecidcal
select a1.ntransid, a1.axpdef_tstructid from axpdef_tstruct a1 order by a1.ntransid
select fldordno from tstruct_mst_details s where s.sourceid=:oldrecid
select cast(typename as varchar(20)) as typename from customtypes
select cast('NA' as varchar(20)) as typename
select cast(typename as varchar(20)) typename,datatype,width,dwidth from axp_customdatatype where isactive ='T'
select cast('NA' as varchar(20)) as typename ,datatype ,width,deci as dwidth from customtypes

name.a14: iif(name = stransid, name + { Should not be transid},{T})

a22.l: Select case when lower(substr( :name ,1,1)) in ( 'a','b','c','d','e','f','g','h','i','j','k','l','m','n','o','p','q','r','s','t','u','v','w','x','y','z') then 'T' else 'F' end as

validchk.a14: iif(fcharcheck= {F},{ Fieldname should always start with character}, iif(validchk={F},{Special Characters are not allowed in Name},{T}))

namevalid.a14: iif(namevalid=1 | namevalid>1,name + { is a Keyword or function name.Please enter Different Name},{T})

a22.l: select cast( a1.caption||'('|| a1.name || ')' as varchar(100)) as dcname,A1.CTDC,A1.FIELD_MAXNUM,axpdef_dcid,a1.asgrid,a1.caption,a1.name
from axpdef_dc a1 where a1.stransid= :stransid and a1.asgrid='F'
select cast( a1.caption||'('|| a1.name || ')' as varchar(100)) as dcname,A1.CTDC,A1.FIELD_MAXNUM,axpdef_dcid,a1.asgrid,a1.caption,a1.name
from axpdef_dc a1 where a1.stransid= :stransid and a1.asgrid='T' and :customdatatype not in ('Auto Generate','Rich Text','Check box','SQL Editor','Expression Editor','Image')
select FIELD_MAXNUM from coretstructhdr where coretstructhdrid = :recid
select cast(dt as varchar(20)) as dt,ord from(
select datatype as dt,6 as ord from customtypes
select datatype as dt,7 as ord from axp_customdatatype
and :customdatatype is not null and ( :cdatatype is null or :cdatatype = 'NA' )
and :customdatatype is not null and ( :cdatatype is null or :cdatatype = 'NA' )

fdecimal.a14: iif(fdecimal<datawidth,{T},{Should not be greater than Data Width})

dbdecimal.a14: iif(dbdecimal< fdecimal & customdatatype= {Decimal Number} ,{Should not be Less than Decimal} ,{T})

Searchhide.a13: iif(customdatatype={Large Text} || customdatatype={Image} || customdatatype={Table} || customdatatype={Password} || customdatatype={Multi Select} || customdatatype={Rich Text}, {T},{F})

maskhide.a13: iif(customdatatype={DropDown} || customdatatype={Multi Select} || customdatatype={CheckList} || customdatatype={Check box} || customdatatype={RadioGroup} || customdatatype={Image} || customdatatype={Time} || customdatatype={Date} || customdatatype={DateTime} || customdatatype={Rich Text} || customdatatype = {Password}, {T},{F})

encryptionhide.a13: iif( (customdatatype={Image} || customdatatype={Time} || customdatatype={Date} || customdatatype={Auto Generate} || customdatatype={DateTime} ) || ( datatype ={Numeric}), {T},{F})

a22.l: select cast(moe as varchar(50)) as moe,sno from (
select modeofentry as moe,1 as sno from customtypes
select 'Fill' as moe,2 as sno where :customdatatype !='Auto Generate'
select 'Calculate' as moe,3 as sno where :customdatatype !='Auto Generate'
select 'From API' as moe,4 as sno where :customdatatype !='Auto Generate'
select 'Fill from API' as moe,4 as sno where :customdatatype !='Auto Generate'

dsf.a14: iif(customdatatype={Table} & isempty(Def_table) ={T} & isempty(dsf) ={T} ,{ Field is Mandatory} ,{T} )

Def_table.a14: iif(customdatatype={Table} & isempty(Def_table) ={T} & isempty(dsf) ={T} ,{ Field is Mandatory} ,{T} )

prefixunique.a14: iif(prefixunique>0,{ Prefix should be unique in a sequence},{T})

prefixactiveflag.a14: iif(prefixactiveflag >1,{ Multiple active prefix is not allowed in a sequence},{T})

a22.l: select cast(case when COALESCE(e.caption,'')='' then e.name else e.caption end ||'-('||e.name||')' as varchar(250)) caption, e.NAME as name,case when strpos(lower(sql),'where')>0 then left(sql,strpos(lower(sql),'where')-1) else sql end as modeofentry from vw_field_informations e
where (e.MODEOFENTRY='Select From Form' or e.MODEOFENTRY='Select From Sql')

a59.l: select cast(case when COALESCE(e.caption,'')='' then e.name else e.caption end ||'-('||e.name||')' as varchar(250)) caption, e.NAME as name,case when strpos(lower(sql),'where')>0 then left(sql,strpos(lower(sql),'where')-1) else sql end as modeofentry from vw_field_informations e
where (e.MODEOFENTRY='Select From Form' or e.MODEOFENTRY='Select From Sql')

a22.l: select split_part(split_part(lower( regexp_replace( replace( :v_sql , ':','') ,'\r\n?|\n','','g')), 'from', 1),'select',2) scolname where :v_sql is not null

a59.l: select split_part(split_part(lower( regexp_replace( replace( :v_sql , ':','') ,'\r\n?|\n','','g')), ' from ', 1),'select',2) scolname where :v_sql is not null

a22.l: select cast(moe as varchar(50)) as moe,sno from (
select executeapidefid,execapidefname from executeapidef where APICategory='SQL' and APIResponseType='Axpert'

apidefname.a14: iif(modeofentry={Accept} & acceptchoice={API} & isempty(apidefname)={T}, { Field is Mandatory},{T})

a22.l: select cast(concat(caption,'-(',name,')') as varchar(500)) caption,name as fname
select cast(case when COALESCE(c.caption,'')='' then c.name else c.caption end ||'-('||c.name||')' as varchar(250)) caption, c.name,c.SORDNO
select case when count(*)=0 then 1 else max(fldordno) +1 end as cnt from tstruct_mst_details s

lastcharmask.a2: No of last characters to be displayed

firstcharmask.a2: No of first few characters to be displayed

validcharmask.a2: Characters to be displayed in Mask
validcharmask.a14: iif(masking = {Show few characters} & validcharmask = {0} ,{ should not be Empty ! }, {T})

maskroles.a2: Masked value Readable for the roles

a22.l: select groupname from AXUSERGROUPS ORDER BY groupname

maskroles.a14: iif(masking = {Mask all characters} & isempty(maskroles) = {T} ,{ should not be Empty ! },{T})

a22.l: select cast(unnest(string_to_array('Caps,Initcaps,small,isemail,isalpha,isnumeric,isalphanumeric,isphone',','))as varchar(20)) pattern from dual d where :customdatatype <> 'Time'
select cast('24H Format' as varchar(20))as Pattern from dual where :customdatatype = 'Time'
select cast( '*' as varchar(1)) as pwdchar where :customdatatype = 'Password'

pwdalphachar.a2: Password must contain Alpha Numeric Characters

pwdlength.a14: iif(customdatatype={Password} & datawidth < pwdlength ,{ should not be greater than maxlength },{T})

pwdexpiry.a2: No. of Days for Password Expiry

componenttype.a13: iif(customdatatype ={SQL Editor},{Memo},iif(customdatatype ={Expression Editor},{Memo},iif(customdatatype ={Large Text},{Memo},iif(customdatatype ={Check box},{Check box},{}))))

exprset.l0: firesql({q1},{delete from tstruct_mst_details where mastertransid= :stransid and dcname = :dcname and sourcename = :name})
exprset.l1: firesql({q1},{delete from axpflds where tstruct = :stransid and dcname = :dcname and fname = :name })

exprset.l0: firesql({f1},{update coretstructhdr set sorderno=sorderno+1 ,fldordno=fldordno+1 where sorderno >= :sorderno and name != :name and stransid=:stransid})
exprset.l1: firesql({f2},{update tstruct_mst_details set sordno=sordno+1 where sordno >= :sorderno and SOURCETYPE='Inputfield' and sourcename != :name and mastertransid=:stransid})

exprset.l0: firesql({f1},{update coretstructhdr set sorderno=sorderno+1 , fldordno=fldordno+1 where sorderno >= :sorderno and name != :name and stransid=:stransid})
exprset.l1: firesql({f2},{update tstruct_mst_details set sordno=sordno+1 where sordno >= :sorderno and SOURCETYPE='Inputfield' and sourcename != :name and mastertransid=:stransid})

exprset.l0: firesql({q1},{delete from tstruct_mst_details where mastertransid= :stransid and dcname = :dcname and sourcename = :name})
exprset.l1: firesql({q1},{delete from axpflds where tstruct = :stransid and dcname = :dcname and fname = :name })

ddlmasking.r1: masking Equal to Mask all characters
ddlmasking.r3: masking Equal to Show few characters

dbdecimalfield.r1: dbdecimal Less Than or Equal to :fdecimal

dataload.r43: masking Equal to Show few characters
dataload.r45: masking Equal to Mask all characters
dataload.r79: Modeofentry Equal to Fill from API

actionmode.r24: modeofentry Equal to Fill from API
